name: Ball Sort: Puzzle Game
description:
Water Sort Puzzle is a funny, interesting and addictive puzzle game.
A wonderful and challenging game to train your brain in Water Sort
Quickly arrange the water in the tubes until each tube is filled with water of the same color in Water Sort.

HOW TO PLAY
Tap any cup to pour color water into another cup and sort it!
Try not to get stuck with water puzzle, you can restart the level of puzzle at any time.
You can also choose to add water sort props, add a test tube to help you pass the water sort games more easily.

Only by mastering the water sort puzzle games rules can you quickly spell out the combination of water bottles and sort it right.

Easy play, hard to master water games.
Have fun with water pour best spare time killer.
Play water sort puzzle anytime, anywhere.
Exercise your brain with color sort water puzzle games.
Play water games for free, Online & Offline


Sort Puzzle can not only exercise your brain but also relieve your mood in Water Sort.
It is one of the most challenging puzzle games ever in Water Sort.

Show how smart you are! Sort it and succeed!
